metadata.title: Memory Options available with the RA8E1 MCUs

sections.content:
Question:
What memory options do the RA8E1 MCUs support for demanding applications with larger memory needs?
Answer:
To support the diverse and demanding application needs, the RA8E1 Group MCUs support multiple internal and external memory options and interfaces including -
1MB embedded flash and up to 544KB SRAM with ECC/parity protection.
xSPI compliant Octal SPI memory interface with Execute-In-Place, which can be used in Octal, Quad or single SPI mode to access external flash or RAM memory. Two memory devices can be attached to the XSPI interface using chip selects. This interface supports both Octal as well as Hyper Flash and RAM memories
Suitable Products
RA8E1
